entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
